description: Stores information about AP claim invoices.

columns.name: CLAIM_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the invoice record.

columns.name: CREATION_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the invoice was created.

columns.name: DUE_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date when the invoice is due.

columns.name: INV_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the invoice's status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Created


Printed


Payment Received


Closed


Cancelled


Approved


Rejected


Released


Disputed


Not Printed - Paperless

columns.name: CLAIM_ACCT_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the AP claim billing account for this invoice.

columns.name: INVOICE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category identifier of the invoice type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Premium Billing


AP Claim


Capitation Contract

columns.name: RESP_CLASS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category identifier of the responsibility class for this invoice.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Insurance


Health Reimbursement Account

columns.name: BATCH_RUN_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number of the batch run that creates this invoice.
